description:
Head scientist in charge of Chise. He is a nervous man that perpetually wipes his forehead repeatedly with a dark-blue handkerchief he always carries.
His wife and daughter were killed during the Sapporo bombing. He gives Shuuji some pills saying that Chise needs them so her weapon side won`t take over and later gives her some much-needed maintenance. Feeling his job is finally done, he shoots himself in the head. He also makes an appearance in the OVA.
name: Kawahara
